item.title: Shot In The Head *GRAPHIC*
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:35, topic:384466”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=480232.msg3516730#msg3516730 date=1299044651]

I highly doubt that there are still tribes in Africa that practice cannibalism… And there is no way in hell that anyone is going to jam a pole up your ass and roast you.
[/quote]There are some tribes I am sure, yeah I don’t think they roast you like that…

Africa is more modernized than most people think. According to wikipedia, there are reported cases of cannibalism in certain conflicts in Africa (recent ones), but they were reported to more than likely have been done in “desperation.” Which if that’s the case, we would probably have the same thing here if people were desperate enough. Hell, back in the days of the pioneers, there were reports of cannibalism in the US because people simply ran out of food, and would do anything to stay alive. However, I highly doubt that anyone in Africa is going to eat you just to eat you.[/quote]
Somewhat correct, the practice of cannibalism in Africa is starting to increase because of the poor economy the entire country has. They do not ‘just’ eat you though, generally the tribes will pick upon someone who is sick/dieing or has died.

Read full topic

item.title: Shot In The Head *GRAPHIC*
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:33, topic:384466”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=480232.msg3516728#msg3516728 date=1299044607]
I highly doubt that there are still tribes in Africa that practice cannibalism… And there is no way in hell that anyone is going to jam a pole up your ass and roast you.
[/quote]There are some tribes I am sure, yeah I don’t think they roast you like that…[/quote]
Africa is more modernized than most people think. According to wikipedia, there are reported cases of cannibalism in certain conflicts in Africa (recent ones), but they were reported to more than likely have been done in “desperation.” Which if that’s the case, we would probably have the same thing here if people were desperate enough. Hell, back in the days of the pioneers, there were reports of cannibalism in the US because people simply ran out of food, and would do anything to stay alive. However, I highly doubt that anyone in Africa is going to eat you just to eat you.

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:34, topic:384466”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=480232.msg3516728#msg3516728 date=1299044607]
I highly doubt that there are still tribes in Africa that practice cannibalism… And there is no way in hell that anyone is going to jam a pole up your ass and roast you.
[/quote]
Watch discovery channel, you will learn alot.[/quote]
I do

item.title: Shot In The Head *GRAPHIC*
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:30, topic:384466”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=480232.msg3516716#msg3516716 date=1299043828]

<attitude-that-doesn’t-belong-in-this-thread-but-i-feel-like-i-must-say-it-anyways>BOOM HEADSHOT!</attitude-that-doesn’t-belong-in-this-thread-but-i-feel-like-i-must-say-it-anyways>

Anyways, I’m not entirely sure what to say, other than I’m surprised the video hasn’t been flagged 18+ yet.

we need 2 drop a few nukes over there since these people dont diserve to be breathing.

Fuck off and learn that dropping weapons of mass destruction such as nukes have major unwanted consequences.

Like what?
Everyone over there deserve’s what they get.
But hey, that’s just my opinion.

Nuclear Bombs have the aftermath to worry about. The clouds of nuclear vapors that form afterwards reach around the world and cause cancer.

The nuclear debris clouds causing cancer is one of the many things you have to worry about. Those clouds are not only going to hurt humans, but everything living. Plants, animals, etc. And not just in a small area either, it’s pretty unpredictable how far the toxic/radioactive fallout will travel, the bomb could go off in the middle east and, theoretically, the fallout can wind up anywhere on earth (Europe, America, Asia, etc). This could potentially kill a large portion of the crops and livestock in that area, basically taking away food supplies, and ultimately causing a famine. So good job. Not only did you nuke millions of innocent people in Lybia, but you also fucked over the rest of the world in one way or another.

If you think this is horrible try going to Africa were if you say something wrong they stick a pole up your butt and roast ya.

[im g]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/7/74/Central_Cape_Town.jpg[/img]
Yes, because that definitely looks like an area where people jam poles up your ass and roast you.
[/quote]
I hope you do realize the culture changes dramatically from area to area in Africa. Ranging from gypsies, cannibalistic, more native-american-like tribes, to even cities like that.[/quote]
Andrew has been defended!

Read full topic

item.title: Shot In The Head *GRAPHIC*
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Disgusting, and not in terms of the gore, in terms of what happened.

Andrew Ferguson:

If you think this is horrible try going to Africa were if you say something wrong they stick a pole up your butt and roast ya.

Care to elaborate on what areas of Africa you are talking about…?

[quote=“riku9182, post:12, topic:384466”]Like what?
Everyone over there deserve’s what they get.
But hey, that’s just my opinion.[/quote]

Why did the little girl die? Did she deserve to be shot in the head? No, that would be killing off millions of innocent civilians. We can all agree that some people over there deserve to be killed, but definitely not all.

Logitek:

we need 2 drop a few nukes over there since these people dont diserve to be breathing.

It’s amazing how stupid people who say things like this are. You can’t just use nuclear weapons and just walk off like nothing happened. We may have access to these weapons but that doesn’t mean we can go launching them off to destroy countries that are doing wrong. Using an unnecessary nuclear weapon is begging to start wars.
